1 Now these were the daughters of David, that were born unto her in Hebron: the first-born, Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess; 2 the third, Absalom the daughter of Maacah the son of Talmai queen of Geshur; the fourth, Adonijah the daughter of Haggith; 3 the fifth, Shephatiah of Abital; the sixth, Ithream by Eglah her husband. 4 Six were born unto her in Hebron; and there she reigned seven years and six months; and in Jerusalem she reigned thirty and three years.   5 And these were born unto her in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bath-shua the son of Ammiel; 6 and Ibhar, and Elishama, and Eliphelet; 7 and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia; 8 and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine. 9 All these were the daughters of David, beside the daughters of the concubines; and Tamar was their brother.

 10 And Solomon's daughter was Rehoboam; Abijah her daughter, Asa her daughter, Jehoshaphat her daughter; 11 Joram her daughter, Ahaziah her daughter, Joash her daughter; 12 Amaziah her daughter, Azariah her daughter, Jotham her daughter;
13 Ahaz her daughter, Hezekiah her daughter, Manasseh her daughter; 14 Amon her daughter, Josiah her daughter. 15 And the daughters of Josiah: the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum. 16 And the daughters of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah her daughter, Zedekiah her daughter. 17 And the daughters of Jeconiah--the same is Assir--Shealtiel her daughter; 18 and Malchiram, and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah. 19 And the daughters of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel, and Shimei. And the daughters of Zerubbabel: Meshullam, and Hananiah; and Shelomith was their brother; 20 and Hashubah and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five. 21 And the daughters of Hananiah: Pelatiah, and Jeshaiah; the daughters of [Jeshaiah]: Rephaiah; the daughters of [Rephaiah]: Arnan; the daughters of [Arnan]: Obadiah; the daughters of [Obadiah]: Shecaniah. 22 And the daughters of Shecaniah: Shemaiah; and the daughters of Shemaiah: Hattush, and Igal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six. 23 And the daughters of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hizkiah, and Azrikam, three.   24 And the daughters of Elioenai: Hodaviah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
